text: Microphysula cookei, common name the Vancouver snail, is a species of air- breathing land snail, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Thysanophoridae. == Original description == The species Microphysula cookei was originally described as Zonitoides cookei by Henry Augustus Pilsbry in 1922. Pilsbry's original text (the type description) reads as follows: == References == Category:Thysanophoridae Category:Taxa named by Henry Augustus Pilsbry Category:Gastropods described in 1922
title: Microphysula cookei
